techmeme.title: Environmental and health advocates accuse xAI of adding to pollution in Memphis, TN, by using unauthorized gas burning turbines at its new data center (Lora Kolodny/CNBC)
OpenSea says the US SEC sent it a Wells notice calling NFTs sold on the platform securities; CEO Devin Finzer says the company is "ready to stand up and fight" (Katherine Ross/Blockworks)
Super Micro delays filing its annual financial disclosures, a day after short-seller Hindenburg Research alleged "glaring accounting red flags"; SMCI drops 25%+ (Brody Ford/Bloomberg)
Shopify hires Mikhail Parakhin as its CTO; Parakhin joined Microsoft in September 2019 and had been CEO of Advertising and Web Services since September 2022 (Shopify)
Sources: Zurich-based Swiss-Mile, which makes the autonomous Robotic Mule and Robotic Watchdog robots, is close to raising a ~$20M seed at a $100M+ valuation (Eyk Henning/Bloomberg)
